messages.subject: trusting kids
messages.msgSnippet: .  Do I trust that my child DOES know his own life- can discover who he is- does not need to be forced into something someone else wants, and IS good and
messages.messageBody:
. Do I trust that my child DOES know his own life- can discover who he is-
does not need to be forced into something someone else wants, and IS good
and beautiful-without me? I DO! I CAN!


I loved this
we have 3 children 6,8,10
and they have 4 wheel ATVs
this weekend we went on a long four our trip
I took turns riding behind each of our children and totally giving them the
control to
drive... head off a cliff, go slow and cautious, race to catch up with dad,
stop and look at the mountains,
they were amazing I know they learned only from watching and trial and error
each has their own style
and if they learn 90% of their information they're all the better for it
thanks to you Bronwen
Amy
